title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not persisted between sessions in the workbench.
OB: When the workbench is restarted, the MRU file list is empty.
EB: The MRU file list should be maintained and displayed between sessions, so that the user can easily access recently opened files.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench and observe the MRU file list.
